name: Blue Sirens: I'm sorry Jon
description:
Help Jon escape from Garfield! He has gone through a terrible transformation.

But don't forget to save Odie, grab his bone and your keys before you escape!

Controls:

W, A, S, D to move, Space to jump (hold to jump higher) and Mouse button to shoot (this was missed on the instructions screen)

Attribution:

Nirak03 on reddit: https://www.reddit.com/user/Nirak03

Permission was given on 04/10/2019 at 13:30 for the use of a cover picture, Start screen and Game Over screen

One Unity sound effect: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/universal-sound-fx-17256

One Unity background music https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/orchestral/ultimate-game-music-collection-37351

Ancient Forge Studio Level sprites and back drop used from: https://waxx.itch.io/shadow-mines-asset-pack
